scripts.chrome-tests: docker run -e HUB_HOST=http://192.168.1.10:4444/wd/hub -e BROWSER=chrome  -e TAG=@regression  iamsethi/cucumber-selenium-docker  org.junit.runner.JUnitCore com.amazon.runner.RunnerTest
scripts.firefox-tests: docker run -e HUB_HOST=http://192.168.1.10:4444/wd/hub -e BROWSER=firefox  -e TAG=@regression  iamsethi/cucumber-selenium-docker  org.junit.runner.JUnitCore com.amazon.runner.RunnerTest
